New Records: Fred VanVleet recorded his first double-double of the season with 21 points, 10 assists, and seven rebounds.
The Houston Rockets finished 44 for 69 (63.7 percent) on 2-pointers.
Key Match Events: VanVleet had nine points, three rebounds, and two assists in the first quarter, leading a 31-19 Rockets lead.
Eason buried a corner 3 at the 6:38 mark of the second quarter, giving the Rockets a 46-26 lead.
Green drilled a 3-pointer with 28.1 seconds left in the third, extending the Rockets' lead to 94-68.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets cruised to a 127-100 victory, with their bench contributing 31 points.
VanVleet was in control early, with his full-court pass to Jabari Smith Jr. yielding a dunk and a 22-8 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Spurs never led during the game.
Victor Wembanyama scored 15 points but missed 5 of 6 3-pointers.
